abstract: Touring the South Bronx, and shooting a video, with Amanda M. Burden, the city planning commissioner, and Michael Kimmelman, the New York Times architecture critic.
snippet: Touring the South Bronx, and shooting a video, with Amanda M. Burden, the city planning commissioner, and Michael Kimmelman, the New York Times architecture critic.

headline.main: A Walk in the South Bronx With the Planning Commissioner and Our Architecture Critic
